channel.title: swift on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in swift on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Xpc Services On Macos App Using Swift
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before XPC we used to pick up Sockets and Mach Messages (Mach Ports). XPC for communicating processes The XPC mechanism offers an alternative to sockets (or Mach Services using MIG) for IPC.

item.title: Create Circular Text Using Swiftui
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This is what we have when finished. Fire up your Xcode and create new SwiftUI Project. Create new SwiftUI file and named it CircularText.

item.title: Draw Watch Face Using Swiftui
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: SwiftUI are nice and fun to working with. You can read my previous article to get a bit knowledge about create circular control, it will make you easy to working with this article.

item.title: Swiftui
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduces by Apple in WWDC 2019, Swift UI impressed the technophiles with its convenience, as Apple aimed to help developers conduct code easier and spend more time working on other modified functions.

item.title: Uidynamicanimator
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Definition A dynamic item is any iOS or custom object that conforms to the UIDynamicItem protocol. The UIView and UICollectionViewLayoutAttributes classes implement this protocol in iOS 7 and later.

item.title: Reproduce Apple Find Me Bottom Menu View
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Today we are going to recreate Find Me Bottom Menu view in few lines of code. Device list Bottom Menu has three states: Collapsed, HalfExpanded and Expanded like images below

item.title: Build A Passcode View With Swift
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The highlights before we are write our code. Our Passcode view can “becomeFirstResponder” and “resignFirstResponder” to show and hide virtual keyboard if needed.
